title: bhajana sEya radha
sahitya:
bhajana sEya rAdA? rAma!
(bhajana)

anupallavi

aja rudrAdulaku satatam-Atma mantramaina rAma
(bhajana)

caraNam 1

karuku bangAru valva katinentO merayaga ciru navvulu
gala mOgamunu cintinci cintinci
(bhajana)

caraNam 2

aruNA bhAdharamuna surucira dantAvalini merayu kapOla
yugamunu niratamunanu dalaci dalaci   
(bhajana)

caraNam 3

bAguga mAnasa bhava sAgaramunanu darimpa tyAgarAju
manavini vini tArakamagu rAmanAma   
(bhajana)
